pinyin: Xin1 Min2 zhu3 zhu3 yi4 Ge2 ming4

definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: Why do we want to the new-democratic revolution?
sentences.chinese: 我們爲什麼要搞新民主主義革命？

sentences.english: The third part carries on the appraisal of Yun Daiying's New Democratic Revolution theory.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分對惲代英的新民主主義革命理論進行評價。
